name: 郭忠義
objective: 智慧型代理人系統技術結合人工智慧、分散式計算與網際網路技術，逐漸成為未來重要的資訊技術。本課程介紹智慧型代理人系統之理論，包括機器學習以及大數據分析方法- First-order Logic, Fuzzy Set Theory, Neural Network, Game theories and decision making, Decision Tree, KNN, K-Means, Genetic Algorithm,  Singular Value Decomposition, Sampling Distribution, Hypothesis Testing, Linear Regression, Logistic Regressions。

Week 5 First-order Logic

Week 7 Fuzzy Set Theory
Week 8  Fuzzy Set Theory

Week 16  Hypothesis Testing
Week 17 Linear Regression, Logistic Regression
Week 18 Final
